short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can practice any language while you are chatting. You can speak, write, listen and read in the new language you are practicing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can practice any language while you are chatting. You can speak, wirte, listen and read in the new language you are learning.

At the time you can use this app with the following web chat apps:

- Telegram
- Slack
- Whatsapp
- Instagram

This is the first version, so we have some errors! But we are working really hard in order to improve it!

If you need more languages, messagings apps or improve or new features, please let me know it!
